attributes.review: This was trash I could even download it after a day 😢.    I couldn’t even get on AppStore for the whole day!!!!! I would give it a 0 if I could

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: I was really hoping for it to work out and it kept crashing! I love Trump and wanted to know about his plans for the election, but I couldn’t. Very disappointed. 😑

attributes.title: This app is ✨horrible✨
attributes.review: Don’t download this app. It hacked into all my stuff. First, I deleted the app, then I had to throw my phone away and change my number. Thanks a lot orange🥰🧚‍♀️✨💕

attributes.title: Unorganized
attributes.review: This app had my phone doing weird glitches. I was trying to show support but it tried to charge me $500 to download.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: He is taking everything away from people and making 2020 even worse then it already is

attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP
attributes.review: Terrible app with terrible software. I downloaded it in hopes of becoming a white privileged American with rights that other races don’t receive and I am still Hispanic😡😡absolutely hate this app!!!!!

attributes.title: BROKE MY PHONE
attributes.review:
when j opened this app it immediately started glitching and making my phone buzz and then it wouldn't turn off. 

Bad app, even worse President

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible it should get taken down, not tiktok lol , right when I opened the app it would let me do anything till I paid!!
This app was EXTREMELY unhelpful!!! I would like to speak to your manager. I barfed as soon as I opened up the app. And just from beginning on the app for 5 minutes I have a HUGE headache!!

attributes.title: Trump is a liar
attributes.review: So when I downloaded this app I was promised that Trump will make “America Great Again” but so far nothing good has happened in 2020...which makes me wonder when has America ever been great .... #TRUMPISALIAR
